types:type.name: csv
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type csv = Array<{| id: Number, Name: String, Age: Number, Gender: String, DOJ: Date, City: String|}> {"isQuotedString": "false", "header": "true", "headerLineNumber": "0"}

types:type.name: json
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type json = Array<{| std_id: Number {"typeId": "int"}, name: String, age: Number {"typeId": "int"}, gender: String, doj: String, city: String|}> {"example": "[{\\\"std_id\\\":100,\\\"name\\\":\\\"ranjith\\\",\\\"age\\\":20,\\\"gender\\\":\\\"M\\\",\\\"doj\\\":\\\"1994-08-19\\\",\\\"city\\\":\\\"vki\\\"}]"}
